text:
Can someone help answer this question that I got from a client of ours?? I don't know how HubDB behaves quite well enough to know the answer for sure.

---
Our CTO added some functionality that would allow us to type in a url, and it would return a filtered result. However, it goes by numbers, not actual terms.
Aldi looks like <https://www.website.net/fam-rg-127?retailer=3>
Action Alley at Aldi looks like <https://www.website.net/fam-rg-127?term=1&retailer=3>

The question is if we delete Aldi and add a new retailer, will it renumber the entire list? Or would retailer #3 just go away? And, is there a way to see the number on these in HubDB?
shouldn’t reorder the entire list, may however cause the new item to have a higher number than the last number used
this would mean there would be a gap in the ID’s
The only way to see the number is using HubL you’d need to print out the id and value pair for all of the entries for a selected column
<@U26C29XPH> are the vendors in a pick list/choice field?
Yes both the vendors and the terms are.
<@U7SL518D6> is right. If you have option ids `1,2,3,4` and delete `3` then add a new option, you will have `1,2,4,5`
You can also just use the name of the option and we will convert it to the id on the BE
<@U25C65C3S> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/U25C65C3S/FB5GQD1S5/screen_shot_2018-06-12_at_10.31.00_am.png|Screen Shot 2018-06-12 at 10.31.00 AM.png>
<@U25C65C3S> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/U25C65C3S/FB67EL6CV/screen_shot_2018-06-12_at_10.31.06_am.png|Screen Shot 2018-06-12 at 10.31.06 AM.png>
Thank you!
Where’s the “Publish” button on HubDB tables?
“all changes” saved but that “update/Publish” button (I forget the cta on it) is gone
I’ve been editing a table and this is all I see (from the last update a week ago):
looks like it auto publishes the data like it did way back when
Yes - that seems to be the case
I guess I’m confusing this portal with another client where the HubDB tables are being used for dynamic pages

These tables aren’t being used on dynamic pages - perhaps it’s only ones that could directly affect content (as in site-mapped pages … i.e. those generated via a dynamic page) that need to have that “Update” applied
Not everyone is rolled out yet
We should be finishing this week
When creating a table via the HubDB API is there a flag for designating it to be a dynamic page table?
aaannnnd im dumb
nevermind its right in the docs
`useForPages: true` right for future reference?
`lookedAtDevDocs: false`
yep
<https://gph.is/1cg81rf>
lol
